casename: Ong Khim Heng Daniel v Leonie Court Pte Ltd
counsel: VK Rajah SC and Ajinderpal Singh (Rajah & Tann) for the plaintiffs in OS 135/2000 (Defendants in Suit 586/2000); Michael Hwang SC and Edwin Tong (Allen & Gledhill) for the defendants in OS 1135/2000 (Plaintiffs in Suit 586/2000)
tags-parsed: Contract/Contractual terms/Implied term for reasonable time to obtain requisite approval/Whether contract terminated when approval not obtained in first application/Duty to make best endeavours to obtain approval/Whether duty discharged/Whether party entitled to rely on own default to treat contract as terminated

Land/Strata titles/Strata titles board/Board approval for en-bloc sale of condominium/Reasonable time for obtaining approval from Strata Titles Board/Whether confined to first application/Land Titles (Strata) Act (Cap 158)
